@tangocash: I made torrent of full seasons for seven years. Sorely, it happens to be for shows you don't like.

Regarding your suggestion (after people have Columbus moment - America was discovered, NOT created by that gentleman) many people ask me the same. From time to time, I answer, but effect is - negligible.

Look what I posted yesterday, day before, day before that, last week, last month and like gazillion times during seven years:

Along answer yesterday
"Anyone who can log-in, can make and up torrents too. I helped whenever someone wanted to make season packs of my encodes. Most of the times I can't do it myself, from bandwidth and time limitations..."
